price: "E dize: 'Senhor meu! Faze-me desembarcar de um desembarque bendito, e Tu és O Melhor em fazer desembarque'."
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَنزِلۡنِي مُنزَلٗا مُّبَارَكٗا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمُنزِلِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi anzil'nī munzalan mubārakan wa-anta khayru al-munzilīna
